HomePage.title: Bulk Resize Images Online
HomePage.subtitle: Unlimited free image resizer for single or batch processing. Resize, compress, and optimize images instantly in your browser. No registration, no uploads - 100% secure and private.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: The page you are looking for could not be found. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.

AboutPage.metaTitle: About Us - Free Bulk Image Resizer Online
AboutPage.metaDescription: Learn about our bulk image resizer service. Resize, compress, and optimize images in batch with multiple formats and custom dimensions. 100% free and private.
AboutPage.metaKeywords: bulk image resizer, batch image resize, online image optimizer, photo resizer, image compression tool

hero.title: About Our Image Resizer Service
hero.description: We provide a professional bulk image resizer that helps photographers, designers, developers, and businesses resize, compress, and optimize images instantly. Our service processes everything in your browser - 100% secure, private, and free forever.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide the most powerful yet simple image resizing tool available. We believe that resizing and optimizing images should be fast, free, and accessible to everyone - whether you're a photographer preparing images for web, a designer creating thumbnails, or a business owner optimizing content for social media.
mission.quote: Making professional image resizing simple, fast, and accessible for everyone, everywhere.

stats.title: Trusted by Users Worldwide
stats.description: Our image resizer is used by thousands of users globally for various purposes.

features.title: Why Choose Our Image Resizer?
features.description: Our bulk image resizer offers advanced features and capabilities that make it the best choice for professionals and businesses.

highQuality.title: Multiple Resize Modes
highQuality.description: Resize by percentage, dimensions, file size, width, height, or longest side. Choose the mode that fits your needs perfectly.

multipleFormats.title: Multiple Output Formats
multipleFormats.description: Export your images in JPEG, PNG, or WebP formats with adjustable quality settings for optimal results.

responsive.title: Smart Presets
responsive.description: Quick presets for Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, YouTube, and more. Resize images for any platform instantly.

fast.title: Lightning Fast Processing
fast.description: Process images instantly in your browser. No uploads, no waiting - resize hundreds of images in seconds.

privacy.title: 100% Private & Secure
privacy.description: All processing happens in your browser. Your images never leave your device - complete privacy guaranteed.

noLimits.title: No Limits, No Registration
noLimits.description: Resize unlimited images without any sign-up, watermarks, or hidden fees. Completely free forever.

technology.title: Built with Modern Technology
technology.description: Our image resizer is built using cutting-edge web technologies to ensure blazing-fast performance and perfect quality.

frontend.title: Modern Frontend
frontend.description: Built with Next.js and React for a fast, responsive user experience with server-side rendering for optimal SEO.

backend.title: Client-Side Processing
backend.description: Powered by Canvas API for accurate image processing entirely in your browser, ensuring speed and privacy.

cta.title: Ready to Resize Your Images?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust our image resizer for their photo optimization needs. Start resizing images today - fast, free, and private.

ResizeTool.pageDescription: Free online tool to batch resize multiple images at once. Fast, secure, and works entirely in your browser — no upload needed.
